parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns description of vehicle's currently loaded magazine, its ammo count (current/default) and its id. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[currentMagazineDetail]] object </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] - unit or vehicle </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_currentMagazineDetail = [[currentMagazineDetail]] [[player]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>"6.5mm 30Rnd STANAG Mag(30/30)[id:0]"</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_currentMagazineDetail = [[currentMagazineDetail]] Mi_48; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>"30mm HE Shells(250/250)[id:21]</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>_cmd = [[currentMagazineDetail]] [[player]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>"9mm 16Rnd Mag(13/16)[id/cr:10000011/0]"</value></part></template>
_cmd [[splitString]] "([ ]/:)"; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>["9mm","16Rnd","Mag","13","16","id","cr","10000011","0"]</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>
